name: Wand of Healing
description: A magical wand that can heal wounds and restore vitality.
looks: The wand is made of smooth crystal, glowing with a soft white light. It has a delicate filigree design and a clear gemstone at the tip.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A staff infused with the power of healing magic.
looks: The staff is made of smooth oak wood and has a carved crystal at the top. It emits a soft glow of healing energy.

special_effects.healing_aura: Creates a healing aura around the user, increasing health regeneration for nearby allies.

name: Vampiric Dagger
description: A sinister dagger that drains the life force of its victims.
looks: The dagger has a black blade with a serrated edge and a curved, ornate hilt. It is adorned with red gemstones that glow with an eerie light.

special_effects.life_drain: Drains 10% of the damage dealt as health.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A powerful staff that radiates healing energy.
looks: The staff is made of polished ivory and adorned with intricate symbols of healing. It glows with a soft golden light.

special_effects.healing_aura: Creates a healing aura around the user, restoring HP to nearby allies.

name: Healing Potion
looks: The potion is a small glass vial filled with a glowing green liquid.

name: Ring of Strength
description: A magical ring that enhances the wearer's strength.
looks: The ring is made of shining gold with a large ruby set in the center. The band is adorned with intricate engravings of muscles and symbols of strength.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A mystical staff that possesses powerful healing energies.
looks: The staff is made of polished maple wood and is adorned with symbols of life and nature. It emanates a soft green glow.

special_effects.healing_boost: Increases the power of healing spells and abilities by 20%.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Ruby Ring
description: A beautiful ring adorned with a large ruby gem.
looks: The ring is made of pure gold with intricate engravings along the band. The centerpiece is a large ruby gemstone that shines bright red.

special_effects.luck_boost: Increases the chance of finding rare items.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks
